title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 21.61 - Plant location adjustments for producer milk and nonpool milk
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 21.61 - Plant location adjustments for producer milk and nonpool milk

State Regulations

For purposes of making payments for producer milk and
nonpool milk, a plant location adjustment shall be determined by subtracting
the Class I price specified in section
21.41
of this Part from the Class I
price at the plant's location. The difference, plus or minus as the case may
be, shall be used to adjust the payments required pursuant to sections 21.51
and
21.60
of this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
21.61

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
